Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- for (int i=0; i < realArgs.length; i++) {
+ for (Object realArg : realArgs) {
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over `realArgs`, use an enhanced for loop. This would make the code cleaner and easier to read.

The current exception handling simply rethrows the exception, wrapping it in a ScriptRuntimeException. This is not very helpful for debugging. Instead, we should log the exception and provide a more meaningful message.
